languages.text: "Я могу упускать какие-то нюансы, но у меня есть твердые доказательства, что лицо, известное нам сейчас как Джай Хейдари, проходило службу в Девятнадцатом Ифритском полку, было уличено в многочисленных случаях хищений имущества, контрабанде и дезертирстве. И происхождения данное лицо не аристократического, а самого низкого".

"I may have overlooked some nuances, but I have solid evidence that the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari served in the 19th Efreet Regiment, and was identified as the perpetrator of numerous instances of theft and smuggling, as well as desertion. And this individual is not of noble birth, but of the lowest origins."
languages.original_text: "Я могу упускать какие-то нюансы, но у меня есть твердые доказательства, что лицо, известное нам сейчас как Джай Хейдари, проходило службу в Девятнадцатом Ифритском полку, было уличено в многочисленных случаях хищений имущества, контрабанде и дезертирстве. И происхождения данное лицо не аристократического, а самого низкого".

And this individual is not of noble birth, but of the lowest origins."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

And this individual is not of noble birth, but of the lowest origins."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “或许我忽略了部分细微问题，但我有确凿证据表明，我们所知的这位婕伊·海达利曾在艾弗里特第十九师团服役过，被认定多次犯下偷窃与走私罪行，还当了逃兵。此外，此人并非贵族，她的出身极其低微。”
languages.original_text: "I may have overlooked some nuances, but I have solid evidence that the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari served in the 19th Efreet Regiment, and was identified as the perpetrator of numerous instances of theft and smuggling, as well as desertion. And this individual is not of noble birth, but of the lowest origins."

traits.locale_text: “或许我忽略了部分细微问题，但我有确凿证据表明，我们所知的这位婕伊·海达利曾在艾弗里特第十九师团服役过，被认定多次犯下偷窃与走私罪行，还当了逃兵。此外，此人并非贵族，她的出身极其低微。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「私は何らかの意味合いを見逃している可能性はあります。ですが、現在ジェイ・ヘイダリとして知られている人物が、かつてイフリート第19連隊に所属しており、脱走だけでなく、窃盗や密輸まで行ったという確たる証拠があるのです。そしてこの人物は決して高貴な生まれではなく、むしろ下層の出自であるということも」
languages.original_text: "I may have overlooked some nuances, but I have solid evidence that the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari served in the 19th Efreet Regiment, and was identified as the perpetrator of numerous instances of theft and smuggling, as well as desertion. And this individual is not of noble birth, but of the lowest origins."

traits.locale_text: 「私は何らかの意味合いを見逃している可能性はあります。ですが、現在ジェイ・ヘイダリとして知られている人物が、かつてイフリート第19連隊に所属しており、脱走だけでなく、窃盗や密輸まで行ったという確たる証拠があるのです。そしてこの人物は決して高貴な生まれではなく、むしろ下層の出自であるということも」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Es posible que haya obviado algún detalle, pero tengo pruebas fehacientes de que la persona a la que ahora conocemos como Jae Heydari sirvió en el 19.º regimiento de Efreet, que fue identificada como responsable de numerosos casos de robo y contrabando además de deserción. Además, lejos de ser de noble cuna, su origen es el más rastrero imaginable».
languages.original_text: "I may have overlooked some nuances, but I have solid evidence that the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari served in the 19th Efreet Regiment, and was identified as the perpetrator of numerous instances of theft and smuggling, as well as desertion. And this individual is not of noble birth, but of the lowest origins."

traits.locale_text: «Es posible que haya obviado algún detalle, pero tengo pruebas fehacientes de que la persona a la que ahora conocemos como Jae Heydari sirvió en el 19.º regimiento de Efreet, que fue identificada como responsable de numerosos casos de robo y contrabando además de deserción. Además, lejos de ser de noble cuna, su origen es el más rastrero imaginable».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Quelques nuances m'ont peut-être échappé, mais j'ai des preuves solides que la personne que nous connaissons sous le nom de Jae Heydari a servi dans le 19e régiment d'Éfrit et a été reconnue coupable de plusieurs vols et actes de contrebande, en plus d'avoir déserté. En outre, c'est une femme aux origines très modestes qui n'a pas une goutte de sang noble. »
languages.original_text: "I may have overlooked some nuances, but I have solid evidence that the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari served in the 19th Efreet Regiment, and was identified as the perpetrator of numerous instances of theft and smuggling, as well as desertion. And this individual is not of noble birth, but of the lowest origins."

traits.locale_text: « Quelques nuances m'ont peut-être échappé, mais j'ai des preuves solides que la personne que nous connaissons sous le nom de Jae Heydari a servi dans le 19e régiment d'Éfrit et a été reconnue coupable de plusieurs vols et actes de contrebande, en plus d'avoir déserté. En outre, c'est une femme aux origines très modestes qui n'a pas une goutte de sang noble. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Vielleicht habe ich manche Nuancen übersehen, aber mir liegen stichhaltige Beweise vor, dass die Person, die wir aktuell als Jae Heydari kennen, im 19. Efreet-Regiment diente und als Täterin zahlreicher Fälle von Diebstahl und Schmuggel sowie Fahnenflucht ausgemacht wurde. Und diese Person ist nicht von adliger Abstammung, sondern von niederster Herkunft."
languages.original_text: "I may have overlooked some nuances, but I have solid evidence that the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari served in the 19th Efreet Regiment, and was identified as the perpetrator of numerous instances of theft and smuggling, as well as desertion. And this individual is not of noble birth, but of the lowest origins."

traits.locale_text: Vielleicht habe ich manche Nuancen übersehen, aber mir liegen stichhaltige Beweise vor, dass die Person, die wir aktuell als Jae Heydari kennen, im 19. Efreet-Regiment diente und als Täterin zahlreicher Fälle von Diebstahl und Schmuggel sowie Fahnenflucht ausgemacht wurde. Und diese Person ist nicht von adliger Abstammung, sondern von niederster Herkunft."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Bazı nüansları es geçmiş olabilirim ancak hâlihazırda Jae Heydari olarak bildiğimiz kişinin 19. İfrit Alayı'nda hizmet ettiğine, sayısız hırsızlık ve kaçakçılık olayının faili olarak tanımlandığına ve bir asker kaçağı olduğuna dair somut delillerim var. Ayrıca bu şahıs; soylu bir aileden değil, en alt mertebelerden gelmekte."
languages.original_text: "I may have overlooked some nuances, but I have solid evidence that the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari served in the 19th Efreet Regiment, and was identified as the perpetrator of numerous instances of theft and smuggling, as well as desertion. And this individual is not of noble birth, but of the lowest origins."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı nüansları es geçmiş olabilirim ancak hâlihazırda Jae Heydari olarak bildiğimiz kişinin 19. İfrit Alayı'nda hizmet ettiğine ve sayısız hırsızlık ve kaçakçılık olayının faili olarak tanımlandığına ve de bir asker kaçağı olduğuna dair somut delillerim var. Ve bu şahıs soylu bir aileden değil, en alt mertebelerden gelmekte."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
